model.map

Class VertexObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.map.VertexObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Settlement

    public class VertexObject
extends java.lang.Object
    The VertexObject class is used represent either a settlement or a city
    Version:
    1.0 Build Jan, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      VertexLocation location
      Represents the location of this vertex on the board.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      VertexObject(int x_t, int y_t, VertexDirection dir, int player_t)
      Constructor independant of VertexObject storage.
      VertexObject(VertexLocation location_t, int player_t)
      Map dependant constructor, used only if the VertexLocation is stored outside the object

    • Field Detail

      • location

        public VertexLocation location
        Represents the location of this vertex on the board. May be null if the Vertex Object is stored in a map.
